Class CAUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for CA: product, aproduct
    Author:
    Davide Basile

    • Method Detail

      • product

        public static CA product(CA[] aut)
        compute the product automaton of the CA given in aut
        Parameters:
        aut - the operands of the product
        Returns:
        the composition of aut

      • removeUnreachable

        public static CA removeUnreachable(CA at)
        remove the unreachable transitions from aut
        Parameters:
        at - the CA
        Returns:
        a new CA clone of aut with only reachable transitions

      • removeHangedTransitions

        public static CA removeHangedTransitions(CA at)
        remove transitions who do not reach a final state
        Parameters:
        at - the CA
        Returns:
        CA without hanged transitions

      • recGen

        protected static void recGen(int[][] fin,
          int[][] modif,
          int[] states,
          int indmod,
          int indstates,
          int[] insert)
        Generates all possible combinations of the states in fin, stored in modif
        Parameters:
        fin - the array of final states of each principal
        modif - the array of final states of the composition, modified by side effect
        states - states[i] = fin[i].length
        indmod - index in modif, the first call must be 0
        indstates - the index in states, the first call must be states.length-1
        insert - it is used to generate all the combinations of final states, the first call must be all zero

      • aproduct

        public static CA aproduct(CA[] a)
        compute the associative product of the CA in the array a
        Parameters:
        a - array of CA
        Returns:
        the associative product
